Happy New Year to all of you!  Tamagoro scores another win for all of us!
Happy New Year to you too, my good man!

Yet another incredible work by Tamagoro. Easily one of my favorite doujinshi creators, and a fairly talented one too. Whether you're into big tits or you go for some lolicon-lovin', Tamagoro has you covered. Incidentally, I found it hilarious that the manga the guy had was actually another of Tamagoro's works, Chichikko Bitches Vol. 3 with Wendy from Fairy Tail. Oh, incidentally, that same work was originally published in Japan on December 31st, 2012. That's not really relevant, mind you, but still, since I am making this post on New Year's Eve (for my time zone anyways) I figured it was worth mentioning. Anyways, to all my fellows in the pervert community, Happy New Year, and the best of wishes for many more to come! ...Er, so to speak. Yeah...
